channel.title: The Dinner Party Download
channel.description: The Dinner Party Download is a fast and funny hour of culture, food and conversation -- the arts and leisure section of public radio -- with hosts Rico Gagliano and Brendan Francis Newnam. Twitter: @dinnerpartydnld.
